title: Right-Facing Fist

nouns: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

description: A fist pointing right, which may be used in conjunction with the left-facing fist to complete a fist-bump gesture.
apple_vendor_description: The right-facing fist emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a strong, confident posture, rendered in a warm, medium skin tone. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading gives it a sense of solid mass and power, with realistic lighting catching the knuckles and contours. Its soft rounded edges ensure it feels approachable yet firm, commonly used to signify agreement, solidarity, support, or a celebratory 'fist bump' in conversations across Apple platforms.
